title: Unveiling the silent suffering: Examining the complexities of disclosure and concealment strategies in women living with obstetric fistula
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Sandra Freda Wood, Ebenezer Ato Kwamena Aidoo, Kweku Ewusie Orleans Lindsay, Jessica Afful Tuleassi, Frank Nukunu, Cindy Afoakwa-Acheampong
